snippet: “I’m not running for some America,” Mrs. Clinton said at a rally at which she denounced Republican economic policies. “I’m running for all Americans.”
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton, in largest campaign event to date, delivers speech to audience on Roosevelt Island that focuses on Republicans' failure to address income inequality; portraying herself as a populist fighter, Clinton pledges a battle for the middle class that will include revisions to tax code.
lead_paragraph: “I’m not running for some America,” Mrs. Clinton said at a rally at which she denounced Republican economic policies. “I’m running for all Americans.”

headline.main: Hillary Clinton, in Roosevelt Island Speech, Pledges to Close Income Gap
headline.print_headline: Sounding Populist Themes, Clinton Pledges to Close Gap in Wealth
